items.text:
Swipe views allow you to navigate between sibling screens, such as tabs, with a
horizontal finger gesture, or swipe.
items.href: Create swipe views with tabs using ViewPager2  |  Android Developers

items.text:
To insert child views that represent each page, you need to hook this layout to
a FragmentStateAdapter.
items.href: Create swipe views with tabs using ViewPager2  |  Android Developers

items.text: Here's how you might use it to swipe across a collection of Fragment objects:
